item.title: Polo G - RAPSTAR
item.description:
작곡: Shane Lindstr.., Polo G / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 96028 / KY: 23711

Uh copped a BMW
new deposit
I picked up
another bag
Like
fxxx it
I’ma count
while I’m in it
I hear planes flyin’
crowds screamin’
Money counters
chains clangin’
Sxxx
I guess
That’s how it sound
when you winnin’
I ain’t jokin’
do it sound
Like
I’m kiddin’
I been makin’ like
two thousand a minute
So high up
through the clouds
I was
swimmin’
I’m probably
gon’ drown
When
I’m in it
I bet
she gon’ get loud
When
I’m in it
And we might
have a child
When
I’m finished
I won’t love a ho
after we fxxx
She can’t get near me
only bxxxx
I give a conversation
to is Siri
My pants
Amiri
Yes I’m winnin’
clearly
I’m the chosen
one
Seen my potential
so they fear me
Lately
I’ve been prayin’
God I wonder
can you hear me
Thinkin’
‘bout the old me
I swear
I miss you dearly
Stay down
’til you come up
I’ve been stickin’
to that theory
Every day
a battle
I’m exhausted
and I’m weary
Make sure
I smile in public
When alone
my eyes teary
I fought
through it all
But that sxxx hurt me
severely
I’ve been gettin’
high to hide behind
My insecurities takin’
different pills
But I know
it ain’t gon’

new deposit
I picked up
another bag

while I’m in it

two thousand a minute

swimmin’
I’m probably

When

I bet
she gon’ get loud
When
I’m in it
And we might
have a child
When
I’m finished
They say
I’m Pac rebirth
Never put out
a weak verse
Homicides
when we lurk
I’ma step
’til my feet hurt
Been puttin’ them
streets first
White tees turned
burgundy T-shirts
Lookin’
for somethin’ real
He stuck
in a deep search
Anxiety
killin’ me
I just wanna
leave earth
When they ask
if I’m okay
It just make
everything seem worse
Tryna explain
your feelings
Sound like something
you rehearsed
Stabbed me in my back
with a clean smirk
Lookin’ so deep
into your eyes
I can read
your thoughts so
Shut
the fxxx
I mean
please don’t talk
I done been
through too much
And I don’t need
another loss
Put that
on every war scar
For every battle
I fought
Uh copped a BMW
new deposit
I picked up
another bag
Like
fxxx it
I’ma count
while I’m in it
I hear planes flyin’
crowds screamin’
Money counters
chains clangin’
Sxxx
I guess
That’s how it sound
when you winnin’
I ain’t jokin’
do it sound
Like
I’m kiddin’
I’ve been makin’ like
two thousand a minute

through the clouds
I was
swimmin’

When

When

when I’m finished

item.title: Lil Tjay,Polo G,Fivio Foreign - Headshot
item.description:
작곡: Lil Tjay, Fivi.., Polo G / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 96050 / KY: 79093

I’m the one who tried
to make a way
When we was strugglin’
I remember rain
Sleet and snow
I was hustlin’
Know
the feds watchin’
Middle fingers
to the government
Glock
in this Louis pouch
Nxxxx
I ain’t tusslin’
Catfish
he don’t really know
Who he fxxxxx’
with opps
Send
a message
You grab a Drac’
to rebuttal it
Had
a undertaker
At your tombstone
shovelin’
Hell yeah hollows
bound to chew ’em
Like
some Doublemint
Made it out the field
with some nxxxxx
I was thuggin’ with
we’ll send some shots
Through they crowd
while they huddlin’
I’m the type
to leave it
In the streets
I ain’t discussin’ it
Tryna make it
flip
I need that
Rolls-Royce Cullinan
Old bxxxxxx
trippin’
Cut her off
like a backwood
Middle
of the trenches
That’s where me
and the guys stood
Killers anonymous
black masks
And black hoods
walk down on him
Make sure
he get clapped good
I feel like the man
of the hour
I do
this gun on me
I’m demandin’
the power
He never talk
to my face
That man is a coward
ayy uh uh
Go lookin’ for him
every hour uh
I ‘member nights
in the tower
She sxxxxx’ my dxxx
out the shower
Tell her be quiet
she told me
Fxxx me even louder
ayy ayy uh
Paid now
feet up
All of your sneakers
is beat up
Percocet
geek up
You see the police
and we speed up
Uh yeah
look
They tryna catch us
and link us
Uh yeah
they tryna find us
But they don’t know
where to meet us uh
She wanna chill
with me
And
all my nxxxxx
She get extra freaky
off the liquor uh
She told us
that she got a man
So we extra sneaky
when I’m with her
She a lil’ bad broad
she wanna go mad far
Fivio Foreign
in a fast car
I’m
in a fast car uh
Fresh
in the game
Still see it
as a blessin’ the same
Hundred
thousand
‘Round my neck
for the chain
Tryna go out like
a vet’ in the game
Put respect on my name
no security
I’m flexin’ with gang
I’m a real one
Reminiscin’ about
all of my decisions
Embracin’ the way
of livin’
I was
runnin’
Through
the field dumb
Couple nxxxxx
disrespectin’
We done killed them
keep a shooter
They won’t see
he my lil’ one
Thirty
shots
We ain’t
into usin’ lil’ guns
Nxxxx talkin’
like he know me
He my real son
rap beef
Fxxx the cap
I’ma drill some
Put the glizzy
to your melon
Make
you feel dumb
Headshot all black
he won’t feel nothin’
Couple hollows
to his back
We done
filled him
Headshot or a lifelong
sentence
What you need
for them
To label
you a real one
